title: Zooroona Restaurant and Lounge
typeOfFood: Delivery, Take-out, Catering, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Warm middle eastern decor with a choice of conventional seating and floor seating in semi private elevated booths. Live middle eastern dancing weekly. Sip a cardamom tea, enjoy a fresh Arabic Desert Salad, or taste some of the most vibrant dishes of Iraq, Syria, Turkey, and Lebanon. Some vegetarian choices and a few vegan.
